title.narrative: Support to the 92 Group in the area of climate and environment 2015-2017

description.narrative: The aim is to ensure that the "green" Danish civil society, organized in the Network called the "92 Group" (comprising 23 organisations), can play an active and coordinated role in international processes on environment and climate in order to further sustainable Development at the global scale. The Group will have a special focus on poor and marginalized groups, equity and right based approached. In addition the 92 Group is engaged in information activities aimed at enhancing the knowledge among the public in Denmark on national and international efforts related to sustainable Development and thereby supplementing what is already being done by individual organizations. Finally the 92 Group is undertaking capacity Building among its member organizations. key processes in 2015 for the 92 Group to follow are the post 2015 process on sustainable development goals and the climate negotiations culminating in December 2015 in Paris. The 92 Group is actively participating in international civil society networks engaged in the two processes. Increasingly focus is also given to the issue of corporate accountability.
